directions: In a bowl with a fork mash the blue cheese and whisk in the vinegar, the oil, the Worcestershire sauce, and salt and pepper to taste, whisking until the dressing is emulsified. In a large bowl toss the spinach and the endive with the dressing until the salad is combined well.
ingredients: 1 tablespoon red-wine vinegar, or to taste
4 cups spinach leaves, washed well and spun dry
title: Spinach and Endive Salad with Blue Cheese Dressing
